main.name: Thanh Lai
main.description: My most enduring trait is my curiosity and that shows in my willingness to learn
main.bio: My hobbies include watching my beloved Manchester United, taking tranquil hikes, and long directionless strolls. Besides computer science, I like to seek out long meaningful conversations in a range of topics include animals, history, science, politics, and geopolitics. I drink way too much bubble tea and I find myself watching too many dog videos on youtube. I have a notably horrendous track record of judging how long to microwave something and I strongly believe unsolicited pop ups are the root of all evil.
main.contactmessage: Lets get coffee or bubble tea!

education.description: 17 week immersive software engineering program focused on fullstack Javascript web development using the NERD stack (Node.js, Express.js, React.js, and the database ORM Sequelize)
GPA: 3.7/4.0, Latin Honor: Magna Cum Laude

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Full stack developer utilizing LAMP stack (Linux, Azure, MySQL, PHP), JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, Redis, and more.•Developed new features and maintained the company’s Customer Relationship Management system.•Implemented a rating and tagging system which allows for more strategic and accurate use of data.•Built data-driven report dashboards to provide the business with key data to make informed decisions.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Full stack developer utilizing JavaScript, React, Redux, MySQL, CSS, and more.•Developed new user-facing features such as a calendar dashboard and workout scheduling.•Built REST APIs and updated Redux store to integrate new features.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience in the NERD stack and LAMP stack.

projects.title: Play Sudoku
projects.category: A sudoku player with all the features needed to enjoy the game. Dedicated to Maki Kaji (Oct 8, 1951 - Aug 10, 2021)

projects.category: AI chatbot that answers interview questions and tells jokes

quotes.text: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
Nothing can stop a person with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help a person with the wrong mental attitude.
